description: When encrypting a file, the GFE extension is appended on to the end of the file. If your file is example.doc , the new filename would example.doc.gfe once it's encrypted.

To encrypt a file, click the "Advanced Tools" tab from the Glary Utilities start screen, click "Encrypt files" under "Privacy," click Add File(s) , navigate to your file, click Open , choose the save location of the file, create your encryption password, and click Encrypt Now! .

To decrypt a file, click the "Advanced Tools" tab from the Glary Utilities start screen, click "Encrypt files" under "Privacy," select the "Decrypt file" tab, click Browse... , navigate to your file, click Open , enter your password, click Browse.. under the "Password" field, choose the save location, click OK , and click Decrypt Now! .
